title: Address Request
description: Json schema for an Address request class. See curl examples: add_address_to_optimization, update_address_in_route

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: 0 is the highest priority; n has higher priority than n + 1

sequence_no.title: Sequence No
sequence_no.description: The sequence number for the address

geocoded.title: Geocoded
geocoded.description: True means the 'address' field was successfully geocoded

preferred_geocoding.title: Preferred Geocoding
preferred_geocoding.description: Index of 'geocodings' array that the user has chosen

contact_id.title: Contact ID
contact_id.description: Address book contact id (0 means not connected to the address book)

address_stop_type.title: Address stop type
address_stop_type.description: The type of stop that this is (DELIVERY,PICKUP,BREAK,MEETUP,SERVICE,VISIT,DRIVEBY)

customer_po.title: Customer PO
customer_po.description: The customer purchase order for the address

invoice_no.title: Invoice No
invoice_no.description: The invoice number for the address

reference_no.title: Reference NO
reference_no.description: The reference number for the address

order_no.title: Order NO
order_no.description: The order number for the address

cost.title: Cost
cost.description: The cost of the order for the address

revenue.title: Revenue
revenue.description: The total revenue for the address

cube.title: Cube
cube.description: The cubic volume of the cargo being delivered or picked up at the address

first_name.title: First name
first_name.description: The first name of the receiving address

last_name.title: Last name
last_name.description: The last name of the receiving address

email.title: Email
email.description: A valid e-mail address assigned to this stop

time_window_start.title: Time Window Start
time_window_start.description: Time Window Start in seconds, relative to the route start date (midnight), UTC time zone. It is relative to start datebecause start time changes would shift time windows

time_window_end.title: Time Window End
time_window_end.description: Time Window End in seconds, relative to the route start date (midnight), UTC time zone. It is relative to start datebecause start time changes would shift time windows

custom_fields.description: Any unrecognized fields from the original CSV upload will be found here
custom_fields.title: Custom Fields

custom_fields_str_json.title: Custom fields JSON string
custom_fields_str_json.description: JSON string representation of the custom fields

custom_fields_config_str_json.title: Custom fields config JSON string
custom_fields_config_str_json.description: JSON string representation of the custom fields configuration

tracking_number.title: Tracking Number
tracking_number.description: Systemwide unique code, which permits end-users (recipients) to track the status of their order
